home_page_subtitle_visitor: Do. Or do not. There is no try.
authorization_page_activation_loading: Please wait while we activate your account...
authorization_page_activation_success: Your account has been activated. You can now <router-link :to="{name: 'login'}">Sign In</router-link>.
authorization_page_activation_error: Something went wrong - please contact us or try again later.
authorization_page_login_loading: Please wait while we sign you in...
authorization_page_error: Something went wrong - please <router-link :to="{name: 'loginWithoutPassword'}">try again</router-link> later.
general_error: Something went wrong. Please refresh your browser and try again.
server_error: Communication with server failed. Please check your internet connection and try again later.
lwp_page_success: Success! - login authorization link was just sent to your e-mail. Click on it in order to sign in.
lwp_form_success: Login authorization link was just sent to your e-mail. Click on it in order to sign in.
registration_page_success: Success! - please verify your account by clicking on a link that was sent to your e-mail.
registration_form_success: Your account was created - in order to activate it, please click on the verificaiton link that was just sent to your e-mail.
